alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Kandiyohi; Pope; Stearns; Swift; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:23AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Douglas, Pope, southwestern Todd, western Stearns, northeastern Swift and Kandiyohi Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 623 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Lowry to 10 miles northeast of Kerkhoven. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Alexandria around 630 AM CDT. Carlos around 640 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sauk Centre and Melrose. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 81 and 143. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 69 and 84. U.S. Highway 8 in Minnesota near mile marker 6. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 117 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Douglas; Kandiyohi; Pope; Stearns; Swift; Todd
